blocks.name: xpinintabd
blocks.content: Value of the intersection of cross-product with the intersection of a nonempty class. (Contributed by RP, 12-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm xpinintabd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cin(cxp(c0, c1), cint(cab(s0, w1))), cint(crab(s1, cpw(cxp(c0, c1)), wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s1), cin(cxp(c0, c1), cv(s0))), w1))))))
  -| wi(w0, wex(s0, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
} = {
  inintabd(s0, s1, cxp(c0, c1), w0, w1)
  diff.cxp.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.cxp.s(s1, c0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm xpinintabd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  âŠ¢ (w0 â†’((c0 Ã— c1)â‹‚ â‹‚ { s0 | w1 })= â‹‚ { s1 âˆˆ P((c0 Ã— c1))| âˆƒ(s0,(s1 =((c0 Ã— c1)â‹‚ s0)âˆ§ w1))})
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’ âˆƒ(s0, w1))
  âŠ£ d(s0, s1)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c1)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c1)
  âŠ£ d(s1, w1)
} = {
  inintabd(s0, s1, (c0 Ã— c1), w0, w1)
  diff.cxp.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.cxp.s(s1, c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: relintabex
blocks.content: If the intersection of a class is a relation, then the class is nonempty. (Contributed by RP, 12-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm relintabex(setvar s0, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wrel(cint(cab(s0, w0))), wex(s0, w0))
} = {
  sylibr(wrel(cint(cab(s0, w0))), wex(s0, w0), wcel(cint(cab(s0, w0)), universe))
  con4i(wrel(cint(cab(s0, w0))), wcel(cint(cab(s0, w0)), universe))
  sylbi(wn(wcel(cint(cab(s0, w0)), universe)), wn(wrel(cint(cab(s0, w0)))), wceq(cint(cab(s0, w0)), universe))
  intnex(cab(s0, w0))
  mtbiri(wceq(cint(cab(s0, w0)), universe), wrel(cint(cab(s0, w0))), wrel(universe))
  mpbir(wn(wrel(universe)), wex(s0, wn(wcel(cv(s0), cxp(universe, universe)))))
  ax-mp(wex(s0, wn(wcel(cv(s0), cxp(universe, universe)))), wn(wcel(emptycls, cxp(universe, universe))))
  0nelxp(universe, universe)
  spcev(s0, emptycls, wn(wcel(emptycls, cxp(universe, universe))), wn(wcel(cv(s0), cxp(universe, universe))))
  0ex()
  notbid(wceq(cv(s0), emptycls), wcel(cv(s0), cxp(universe, universe)), wcel(emptycls, cxp(universe, universe)))
  eleq1(cv(s0), emptycls, cxp(universe, universe))
  xchnxbir(wrel(universe), wex(s0, wn(wcel(cv(s0), cxp(universe, universe)))), wss(universe, cxp(universe, universe)))
  3bitr2i(wn(wss(universe, cxp(universe, universe))), wex(s0, wn(wcel(cv(s0), cxp(universe, universe)))), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), universe), wn(wcel(cv(s0), cxp(universe, universe))))), wrex(s0, universe, wn(wcel(cv(s0), cxp(universe, universe)))))
  nss(s0, universe, cxp(universe, universe))
  df-rex(s0, universe, wn(wcel(cv(s0), cxp(universe, universe))))
  rexv(s0, wn(wcel(cv(s0), cxp(universe, universe))))
  df-rel(universe)
  releq(cint(cab(s0, w0)), universe)
  intexab(s0, w0)
  diff.wn.s(s0, wcel(emptycls, cxp(universe, universe)))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, emptycls, cxp(universe, universe))
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
  diff.cxp.s(s0, universe, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: elcnvcnvintab
blocks.content: Two ways of saying a set is an element of the converse of the converse of the intersection of a class. (Contributed by RP, 20-Aug-2020.)

blocks.name: relintab
blocks.content: Value of the intersection of a class when it is a relation. (Contributed by RP, 12-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm relintab(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wrel(cint(cab(s0, w0))), wceq(cint(cab(s0, w0)), cint(crab(s1, cpw(cxp(universe, universe)), wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s1), ccnv(ccnv(cv(s0)))), w0))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr3a(cint(cab(s0, w0)), cint(crab(s1, cpw(cxp(universe, universe)), wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s1), ccnv(ccnv(cv(s0)))), w0)))), ccnv(ccnv(cint(cab(s0, w0)))), cin(cxp(universe, universe), cint(cab(s0, w0))), wrel(cint(cab(s0, w0))))
  eqtri(ccnv(ccnv(cint(cab(s0, w0)))), cin(cxp(universe, universe), cint(cab(s0, w0))), cin(cint(cab(s0, w0)), cxp(universe, universe)))
  cnvcnv(cint(cab(s0, w0)))
  incom(cint(cab(s0, w0)), cxp(universe, universe))
  biimpi(wrel(cint(cab(s0, w0))), wceq(ccnv(ccnv(cint(cab(s0, w0)))), cint(cab(s0, w0))))
  dfrel2(cint(cab(s0, w0)))
  syl6eq(cin(cxp(universe, universe), cint(cab(s0, w0))), cint(crab(s1, cpw(cxp(universe, universe)), wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s1), ccnv(ccnv(cv(s0)))), w0)))), cint(crab(s1, cpw(cxp(universe, universe)), wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s1), cin(cxp(universe, universe), cv(s0))), w0)))), wrel(cint(cab(s0, w0))))
  xpinintabd(s0, s1, universe, universe, wrel(cint(cab(s0, w0))), w0)
  relintabex(s0, w0)
  inteqi(crab(s1, cpw(cxp(universe, universe)), wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s1), cin(cxp(universe, universe), cv(s0))), w0))), crab(s1, cpw(cxp(universe, universe)), wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s1), ccnv(ccnv(cv(s0)))), w0))))
  rabbii(s1, cpw(cxp(universe, universe)), wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s1), cin(cxp(universe, universe), cv(s0))), w0)), wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s1), ccnv(ccnv(cv(s0)))), w0)))
  exbii(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s1), cin(cxp(universe, universe), cv(s0))), w0), wa(wceq(cv(s1), ccnv(ccnv(cv(s0)))), w0))
  anbi1i(wceq(cv(s1), cin(cxp(universe, universe), cv(s0))), w0, wceq(cv(s1), ccnv(ccnv(cv(s0)))))
  eqeq2i(cv(s1), cin(cxp(universe, universe), cv(s0)), ccnv(ccnv(cv(s0))))
  eqtr4i(cin(cxp(universe, universe), cv(s0)), ccnv(ccnv(cv(s0))), cin(cv(s0), cxp(universe, universe)))
  incom(cxp(universe, universe), cv(s0))
  cnvcnv(cv(s0))
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm relintab(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0) {
  âŠ¢ (Rel(â‹‚ { s0 | w0 })â†’ â‹‚ { s0 | w0 } = â‹‚ { s1 âˆˆ P((ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ))| âˆƒ(s0,(s1 = `' `' s0 âˆ§ w0))})
  âŠ£ d(s0, s1)

} = {
  3eqtr3a(â‹‚ { s0 | w0 }, â‹‚ { s1 âˆˆ P((ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ))| âˆƒ(s0,(s1 = `' `' s0 âˆ§ w0))}, `' `' â‹‚ { s0 | w0 }, ((ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ)â‹‚ â‹‚ { s0 | w0 }), Rel(â‹‚ { s0 | w0 }))

  cnvcnv(â‹‚ { s0 | w0 })

  dfrel2(â‹‚ { s0 | w0 })
  syl6eq(((ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ)â‹‚ â‹‚ { s0 | w0 }), â‹‚ { s1 âˆˆ P((ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ))| âˆƒ(s0,(s1 = `' `' s0 âˆ§ w0))}, â‹‚ { s1 âˆˆ P((ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ))| âˆƒ(s0,(s1 =((ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ)â‹‚ s0)âˆ§ w0))}, Rel(â‹‚ { s0 | w0 }))
  xpinintabd(s0, s1, universe, universe, Rel(â‹‚ { s0 | w0 }), w0)
  relintabex(s0, w0)
  inteqi({ s1 âˆˆ P((ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ))| âˆƒ(s0,(s1 =((ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ)â‹‚ s0)âˆ§ w0))}, { s1 âˆˆ P((ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ))| âˆƒ(s0,(s1 = `' `' s0 âˆ§ w0))})
  rabbii(s1, P((ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ)), âˆƒ(s0,(s1 =((ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ)â‹‚ s0)âˆ§ w0)), âˆƒ(s0,(s1 = `' `' s0 âˆ§ w0)))
  exbii(s0, (s1 =((ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ)â‹‚ s0)âˆ§ w0), (s1 = `' `' s0 âˆ§ w0))
  anbi1i(s1 =((ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ)â‹‚ s0), w0, s1 = `' `' s0)
  eqeq2i(s1, ((ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ)â‹‚ s0), `' `' s0)
  eqtr4i(((ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ)â‹‚ s0), `' `' s0, (s0 â‹‚(ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ)))
  incom((ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ), s0)
  cnvcnv(s0)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: nonrel
blocks.content: A non-relation is equal to the base class with all ordered pairs removed. (Contributed by RP, 25-Oct-2020.)

blocks.name: elnonrel
blocks.content: Only an ordered pair where not both entries are sets could be an element of the non-relation part of class. (Contributed by RP, 25-Oct-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm elnonrel(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cdif(c2, ccnv(ccnv(c2)))), wa(wcel(emptycls, c2), wn(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)))))
} = {
  bitri(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cdif(c2, ccnv(ccnv(c2)))), wa(wcel(emptycls, c2), wn(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)))), wcel(cop(c0, c1), cdif(c2, cxp(universe, universe))))
  eleq2i(cop(c0, c1), cdif(c2, ccnv(ccnv(c2))), cdif(c2, cxp(universe, universe)))
  nonrel(c2)
  bitri(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cdif(c2, cxp(universe, universe))), wa(wcel(emptycls, c2), wn(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)))), wa(wcel(cop(c0, c1), c2), wn(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(universe, universe)))))
  eldif(cop(c0, c1), c2, cxp(universe, universe))
  bitri(wa(wcel(cop(c0, c1), c2), wn(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(universe, universe)))), wa(wcel(emptycls, c2), wn(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)))), wa(wcel(cop(c0, c1), c2), wn(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)))))
  anbi2i(wcel(cop(c0, c1), c2), wn(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(universe, universe))), wn(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))))
  notbii(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(universe, universe)), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)))
  opelxp(c0, c1, universe, universe)
  pm5.32ri(wcel(cop(c0, c1), c2), wn(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))), wcel(emptycls, c2))
  eleq1d(cop(c0, c1), c2, emptycls, wn(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))))
  opprc(c0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elnonrel(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  âŠ¢ (< c0, c1 > âˆˆ(c2 \ `' `' c2)â†”(âˆ… âˆˆ c2 âˆ§ Â¬(c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ âˆ§ c1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ)))

  bitri(< c0, c1 > âˆˆ(c2 \ `' `' c2), (âˆ… âˆˆ c2 âˆ§ Â¬(c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ âˆ§ c1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ)), < c0, c1 > âˆˆ(c2 \(ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ)))

  eldif(< c0, c1 >, c2, (ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ))
  bitri((< c0, c1 > âˆˆ c2 âˆ§ Â¬ < c0, c1 > âˆˆ(ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ)), (âˆ… âˆˆ c2 âˆ§ Â¬(c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ âˆ§ c1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ)), (< c0, c1 > âˆˆ c2 âˆ§ Â¬(c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ âˆ§ c1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ)))
  anbi2i(< c0, c1 > âˆˆ c2, Â¬ < c0, c1 > âˆˆ(ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ), Â¬(c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ âˆ§ c1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ))

  eleq1d(< c0, c1 >, c2, emptycls, Â¬(c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ âˆ§ c1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ))

blocks.name: cnvssb
blocks.content: Subclass theorem for converse. (Contributed by RP, 22-Oct-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm cnvssb(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wrel(c0), wb(wss(c0, c1), wss(ccnv(c0), ccnv(c1))))
} = {
  impbid2(wrel(c0), wss(c0, c1), wss(ccnv(c0), ccnv(c1)))
  cnvss(c0, c1)
  syl5(wrel(c0), wss(ccnv(c0), ccnv(c1)), wss(c0, c1), wss(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), ccnv(ccnv(c1))))
  cnvss(ccnv(c0), ccnv(c1))
  ex(wrel(c0), wss(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), ccnv(ccnv(c1))), wss(c0, c1))
  eqsstrd(c0, c1, ccnv(ccnv(c0)), wa(wrel(c0), wss(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), ccnv(ccnv(c1)))))
  adantr(wrel(c0), wss(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), ccnv(ccnv(c1))), wceq(c0, ccnv(ccnv(c0))))
  eqcomd(c0, ccnv(ccnv(c0)), wrel(c0))
  biimpi(wrel(c0), wceq(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), c0))
  dfrel2(c0)
  adantl(wrel(c0), wss(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), ccnv(ccnv(c1))), wss(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), c1))
  syl6ss(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), c1, ccnv(ccnv(c1)), wss(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), ccnv(ccnv(c1))))
  id(wss(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), ccnv(ccnv(c1))))
  cnvcnvss(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cnvssb(class c0, class c1) {
  âŠ¢ (Rel(c0)â†’(c0 âŠ† c1 â†” `' c0 âŠ† `' c1))
} = {
  impbid2(Rel(c0), c0 âŠ† c1, `' c0 âŠ† `' c1)
  cnvss(c0, c1)
  syl5(Rel(c0), `' c0 âŠ† `' c1, c0 âŠ† c1, `' `' c0 âŠ† `' `' c1)
  cnvss(`' c0, `' c1)
  ex(Rel(c0), `' `' c0 âŠ† `' `' c1, c0 âŠ† c1)
  eqsstrd(c0, c1, `' `' c0, (Rel(c0)âˆ§ `' `' c0 âŠ† `' `' c1))
  adantr(Rel(c0), `' `' c0 âŠ† `' `' c1, c0 = `' `' c0)
  eqcomd(c0, `' `' c0, Rel(c0))
  biimpi(Rel(c0), `' `' c0 = c0)
  dfrel2(c0)
  adantl(Rel(c0), `' `' c0 âŠ† `' `' c1, `' `' c0 âŠ† c1)
  syl6ss(`' `' c0, c1, `' `' c1, `' `' c0 âŠ† `' `' c1)
  id(`' `' c0 âŠ† `' `' c1)
  cnvcnvss(c1)
}

blocks.name: relnonrel
blocks.content: The non-relation part of a relation is empty. (Contributed by RP, 22-Oct-2020.)

blocks.name: cnvnonrel
blocks.content: The converse of the non-relation part of a class is empty. (Contributed by RP, 18-Oct-2020.)

blocks.name: brnonrel
blocks.content: A non-relation cannot relate any two classes. (Contributed by RP, 23-Oct-2020.)

blocks.name: dmnonrel
blocks.content: The domain of the non-relation part of a class is empty. (Contributed by RP, 22-Oct-2020.)

blocks.name: rnnonrel
blocks.content: The range of the non-relation part of a class is empty. (Contributed by RP, 22-Oct-2020.)

blocks.name: resnonrel
blocks.content: A restriction of the non-relation part of a class is empty. (Contributed by RP, 22-Oct-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm resnonrel(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(cres(cdif(c0, ccnv(ccnv(c0))), c1), emptycls)
} = {
  mpbi(wceq(cres(cdif(c0, ccnv(ccnv(c0))), c1), emptycls), wss(cres(cdif(c0, ccnv(ccnv(c0))), c1), emptycls))
  sseqtri(cres(cdif(c0, ccnv(ccnv(c0))), c1), emptycls, cres(cdif(c0, ccnv(ccnv(c0))), universe))
  ax-mp(wss(cres(cdif(c0, ccnv(ccnv(c0))), c1), cres(cdif(c0, ccnv(ccnv(c0))), universe)), wss(c1, universe))
  ssv(c1)
  ssres2(c1, universe, cdif(c0, ccnv(ccnv(c0))))
  3eqtr3i(cres(cdif(c0, ccnv(ccnv(c0))), universe), emptycls, ccnv(ccnv(cdif(c0, ccnv(ccnv(c0))))), ccnv(emptycls))
  cnveqi(ccnv(cdif(c0, ccnv(ccnv(c0)))), emptycls)
  cnvnonrel(c0)
  cnvcnv2(cdif(c0, ccnv(ccnv(c0))))
  cnv0()
  ss0b(cres(cdif(c0, ccnv(ccnv(c0))), c1))
}
